snippet: The European Parliament included the fugitive former N.S.A. contractor on its list of potential recipients of the 2013 Sakharov Prize for Freedom of Thought.
abstract: European Parliament nominates Edward Snowden for Sakharov Prize for Freedom of Thought, considered Europe's top human rights award, dealing rebuke to Washington.
lead_paragraph: The European Parliament included the fugitive former N.S.A. contractor on its list of potential recipients of the 2013 Sakharov Prize for Freedom of Thought.

headline.main: Snowden Among Nominees for a European Human Rights Prize
headline.print_headline: Snowden Among Nominees for a European Human Rights Prize

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
